thread.section_title: Express to Russia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Express to Russia | expresstorussia.com
thread.title: David Simon
thread.title_full: Express to Russia reviewed by David Simon

author: David Simon
title: David Simon
text: I needed a Russian visa on short notice, and reading the requirements (even as a lawyer) was very daunting. Luckily, I found Express to Russia, which made the process simple and fast -- even managing to correct a mistaken address and a change of flight plans at the last moment. I'm especially grateful to Josephine in the San Francisco office, who took great pains to be sure I submitted everything needed and received the visa even quicker than predicted. I would recommend Express to Russia to anyone.
